title: Bungalow with a breathtaking view!
details:
Mountain Hill is located just 2.7 km from the scenic Nuwara Eliya Golf Club and Royal Colombo Golf Club,
The propertie is located on top of a hill offering a breathtaking view of tea plantations.

Fully furnished Bungalow for sale in Topp Ass, Nuwara Eliya (Below Sanasa Holiday Resort)
Each room will provide you with tile/marble flooring and comfortable stay. Its fully furnished five bedrooms and 3 bathrooms. Bathrooms offers hot and cold shower.
You can enjoy a wonderful mountain view.

Upto 14-15 People could be accommodates in Comfort
Balcony Parking for 2-3 Vehicles
ASKING PRICE - 32 MILLION - NEGOTIABLE AFTER INSPECTION!

Call Mr. Aruna De Silva for more details 0777341504
